alert.note: Alert for Marion (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 30 at 8:34AM CST until February 01 at 9:00AM CST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Mississippi... Pearl River Near Columbia affecting Marion County. Pearl River Near Monticello affecting Lawrence County. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE THURSDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Pearl River near Columbia. * WHEN...Until late Thursday morning. * IMPACTS...At 18.0 feet, Low areas along the river are inundated. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:15 AM CST Tuesday the stage was 17.7 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage tomorrow afternoon and continue falling to 14.0 feet Sunday morning. - Flood stage is 17.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (6 am CST) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Wed Thu Fri Pearl River Columbia 17.0 17.7 Tue 8 am CST 17.3 16.5 15.7 &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=JAN The next statement will be issued this evening at 1015 PM CST.
